recommended_degree: Teknik Elektro, Teknik Elektro Industri, Teknik Elektronika Manufaktur, Teknologi Rekayasa Elektro (Diploma)
job_description:
Membaca electrical drawing dan wiring diagram
Mengnalisa keandalan electrical instrumentation equipment
Troubleshoot and repair electrical and intrumentration equipment
Implementasi preventive daily,weekly,montly electrical instrumentation equipment.
